Compose_-_Account.inputs:
let entityData = @'@{replace(string(body('Select_-_Account')), '''', '\''')}';
let incidentEntities = datatable(temp:string)['']
| extend Entities = parse_json(entityData)
| project-away temp
| mv-expand todynamic(Entities)
| extend EntityData = tostring(coalesce(Entities.userPrincipalName, strcat(Entities.accountName, '@', Entities.upnSuffix)))
| extend Key = tolower(EntityData);
incidentEntities
| join kind=leftouter (_GetWatchlist('@{triggerBody()?['WatchlistName']}') | extend @{triggerBody()?['WatchlistKey']} = tolower(@{triggerBody()?['WatchlistKey']})) on $left.Key == $right.@{triggerBody()?['WatchlistKey']}
| extend OnWatchlist = iff(isempty(_DTItemId), false, true)
| project OnWatchlist, EntityData

Compose_-_CIDR.inputs:
let entityData = '@{replace(string(body('Parse_JSON')?['IPs']), '''', '\''')}';
let incidentEntities = datatable(temp:string)['']
| extend Entities = parse_json(entityData)
| project-away temp
| mv-expand todynamic(Entities)
| project EntityData=tostring(coalesce(Entities.Address, Entities.RawEntity.address));
incidentEntities
| evaluate ipv4_lookup(_GetWatchlist('@{triggerBody()?['WatchlistName']}'), EntityData, @{triggerBody()?['WatchlistKey']}, true)
| extend OnWatchlist = iff(isempty(_DTItemId), false, true)
| project OnWatchlist, EntityData

Compose_-_Host.inputs:
let entityData = '@{replace(string(body('Select_-_Host')), '''', '\\''')}';
let incidentEntities = datatable(temp:string)['']
| extend Entities = parse_json(entityData)
| project-away temp
| mv-expand todynamic(Entities)
| project EntityFQDN=tostring(Entities.FQDN), EntityFQDNKey=toupper(tostring(Entities.FQDN)), EntityHostname=tostring(Entities.Hostname), EntityHostnameKey=toupper(tostring(Entities.Hostname));
let watchListItems = materialize (_GetWatchlist('@{triggerBody()?['WatchlistName']}') | project SearchKey=toupper(@{triggerBody()?['WatchlistKey']}), _DTItemId | extend Hostname=toupper(tostring(split(SearchKey, '.')[0])));
incidentEntities
| join kind=leftouter (watchListItems) on $left.EntityFQDNKey == $right.SearchKey
| join kind=leftouter (watchListItems) on $left.EntityHostnameKey == $right.Hostname
| extend OnWatchlist = iff(isempty(_DTItemId) and isempty(_DTItemId1), false, true)
| project OnWatchlist, EntityData=EntityFQDN
